ΔS = (Scaled High - Scaled Low)
ΔR = (Raw High - Raw Low)
RL = Raw Low
SL = Scaled Low
device.tag-convert-ticktime: Milliseconds to Time format (Remaining or Duration)
device.tag-scale-read-script-tooltip: Script to transform value received from client
device.tag-scale-write-script-tooltip: Script to transform value before write to client
device.tag-scale-script-params-tooltip: JSON formated array of parameters with values to pass to script
gauges.property-event-input: 输入（仅指有名称的输入）

bag.property-color-stop: 指针未划过范围的颜色

script.sys-fnc-settag-tooltip: 设置标签值的系统函数：$setTag (TagID为字符串，值为字符串或数字)
script.sys-fnc-gettag-tooltip: 获取Tag值的系统函数：$getTag (TagID为字符串) 返回值为字符串或数字
script.sys-fnc-setview-tooltip: 在客户端设置视图的系统函数：$setView（视图名称为字符串）
script.sys-fnc-opencard-tooltip: System function to open Card on client: $openCard (View name as string, Options as dict {left, top})
script.sys-fnc-enableDevice-tooltip: System function to enable Device connection: $enableDevice (Device name as string, enable as boolean)
script.sys-fnc-getDevice-tooltip: System function to get Device object: $getDevice (Device name as string, get Comm Interface as boolean)
script.sys-fnc-setAdapterToDevice-toolti: System function to bind Adapter (internal Device) to a Device: $setAdapterToDevice (Adapter name as string, Device name as string)
script.sys-fnc-resolveAdapterTagId-toolt: System function to get Tag ID of Device dind to Adapter (internal Device): $resolveAdapterTagId (TagID as string)
script.sys-fnc-getTagId-tooltip: System function to get Tag ID: $getTagId (Tag name as string, [Optional Device name as string])
script.sys-fnc-getTagDaqSettings-tooltip: System function to get Tag DAQ settings: $getTagDaqSettings (TagID as string)
script.sys-fnc-setTagDaqSettings-tooltip: System function to set Tag DAQ settings: $setTagDaqSettings (TagID as string, DaqSettings as object {restored: boolean, enabled: boolean, changed: boolean, interval: number, lastDaqSaved: number} )
script.sys-fnc-invokeObject-tooltip: System function to call Object function: $invokeObject (Object name as string, function name as string , [parameter])
script.sys-fnc-runServerScript-tooltip: Client function to call Server script function: $runServerScript (Script name as string, [parameter])
script.sys-fnc-getDeviceProperty-tooltip: System function to get Device property: $getDeviceProperty(Device name as string)
script.sys-fnc-setDeviceProperty-tooltip: System function to set Device property: $setDeviceProperty(Device name as string, Property as object {address, port, ...} )
script.sys-fnc-getHistoricalTag-tooltip: get historical tags by milliseconds range: $getHistoricalTags([TagIds] as array, from as number, to as number)
script.sys-fnc-sendMessage-tooltip: System function to send Message (Mail): $sendMessage(address as string, subject as string, message as string)
script.sys-fnc-getAlarms-tooltip: System function to get alarms list (): $getAlarms()
script.sys-fnc-getAlarmsHistory-tooltip: System function to get historical alarms list (): $getAlarmsHistory(from as number, to as number)
script.sys-fnc-ackAlarms-tooltip: System function to ACK alarm (): $ackAlarm(Alarm name as string, [types] 'highhigh|high|low')
script.template-chart-data-tooltip: Code template of customized chart data to return
script.template-invoke-chart-update-opti: Code template to update Chart options (Y-axis scale range). CLIENT mode only!
script.template-getHistoricalTagsoptions: Code template to get Historical Tags values.
client.script-access-info: Configure access to system functions from the frontend (e.g. widgets) via window.fuxaScriptAPI.
dlg.plugins-info: Not installed plugins can be installed in the server manually: 'npm install [package name]@[version]'

dlg.app-auth-expiration-3h: 已启用，令牌将在3小时后过期,
dlg.app-auth-expiration-1d: 已启用，令牌将在1天内到期,
